heading: Skills shortages, recruitment and retention strategies in small and medium-sized enterprises in the EU
subheading: 39% of the interviewed EU-based small and medium-sized companies (SME) agree that skill shortages hold their company back in greening business activities
textNote: Fieldwork was conducted via telephone interviews from 4/5 to 24/5/2023, 12 909 interviews were conducted. Representative sample of business were selected.
